description: head and shoulders of person drawn in thick black lines with solemn expression on face and eyes that are turned down at the corners; jagged bangs fall across the forehead and one hand with long fingers rests under the chin
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: E 43 | LRC of sheet, in red pencil: 21 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2377
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 20 | LL in pencil, below image: Dieb.
title: Thief
